content: FTR Feature TLR Trailer TSR Teaser PRO Promo (This should be used for all non-trailer promos such as those shown at CinemaCon or CineEurope) RTG Rating Tag RTG-F Rating Tag for Feature RTG-T Rating Tag for Trailer POL Policy Trailer ("Turn off cell phones", etc) PSA Public Service Announcement (Charity trailers) ADV Advertisement (All commercials, including music videos) SHR Short Subject XSN Transitional (Includes Digital Black for spacing as well as "Put Your 3D Glasses On Now" cards) TST Test (Framing and/or color charts, etc)
versiontype: Temp Temp Version (without final picture or sound) Pre Pre-release (final picture and sound, but without accessibility features)
redband: RedBand Special Rating Flag (Use only for trailers with adult content)
